SCTX - Script Source:
scriptName mwDAAzuraStatueScript

short speech
float timer

begin onactivate

	if GetStage fbmwDAAzura < 10
		set speech to 1
	endif

	if GetStage fbmwDAAzura == 20
		if player.GetItemCount fbmwsheogorathssignetring == 1
			set speech to 6
		endif
	endif

	if GetStage fbmwDAAzura == 25
		set speech to 8
	endif
end

begin gamemode

	if GetStage fbmwDAAzura >= 30
		return
	endif

	set timer to ( timer - GetSecondsPassed )

	if timer <= 0
		if GetStage fbmwDAAzura < 10
			if speech == 1 
				DisablePlayerControls
				set timer to mwDAAzureStatueREF.Say mwDAAzuraSpeech 1 mwDaedricSpeaker 1
				set speech to 2
			elseif speech == 2
				set timer to mwDAAzureStatueREF.Say mwDAAzuraSpeech 1 mwDaedricSpeaker 1
				set speech to 3
			elseif speech == 3
				set timer to mwDAAzureStatueREF.Say mwDAAzuraSpeech 1 mwDaedricSpeaker 1
				set speech to 4
			elseif speech == 4
				set timer to mwDAAzureStatueREF.Say mwDAAzuraSpeech 1 mwDaedricSpeaker 1
				set speech to 5
			elseif speech == 5
				EnablePlayerControls
				SetStage fbmwdaazura 10
			endif
		elseif GetStage fbmwDAAzura == 20
			if speech == 6
				DisablePlayerControls
				set timer to mwDAAzureStatueREF.Say mwDAAzuraSpeech 1 mwDaedricSpeaker 1
				set speech to 7
			elseif speech == 7
				EnablePlayerControls
				player.AddItem azurasstar 1
				;player.RemoveItem fbmwsheogorathssignetring 1
				SetStage fbmwdaazura 30
			endif
		elseif GetStage fbmwDAAzura == 25
			if speech == 8
				DisablePlayerControls
				set timer to mwDAAzureStatueREF.Say mwDAAzuraSpeech 1 mwDaedricSpeaker 1
				set speech to 9
			elseif speech == 9
				EnablePlayerControls
				SetStage fbmwdaazura 40
			endif
		endif
	endif
end
;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 1366 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>
